code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Card from"../components/Card";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Courses(){const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);const[query,setQuery]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetch("/seqamlab/data/courses.json").then(res=>res.json()).then(setCourses);},[]);const filtered=courses.filter(c=>c.name.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())||(c.semester||"").toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())||(c.description||"").toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-5xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-[#cc0033] mb-4",children:"Courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Filter by name, semester, or description...",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value),className:"border px-3 py-2 rounded w-full mb-6"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:filtered.map((c,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{title:c.name,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:c.semester}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),c.description]},i))})]});}
